nodes.text: Club Lazuli was a club owned by the bartender Di'Reni in the city of Canto Bight on the planet Cantonica. The club was under the protection of the Sixth Kin, a criminal organization led by Wen Delphis. After Koz, a criminal who owed debt to the Sixth Kin, was confronted by Ariole Yu, one of the organization's lieutenants, and the sniper Just Lucky, a fight broke out within Club Lazuli between the Sixth Kin operatives and Koz's associates. Koz escaped through the club's back exit, and Yu and Lucky pursued him as Di'Reni retrieved a blaster and shot down their attackers.
